sentences.english: King Sejong the initiative of the Han nationality's culture has been a qualitative leap.
sentences.chinese: 世宗大王的这一创举使韩民族的文化得到了质的飞跃。

sentences.english: Together with the important leaps in economy, various social causes have also constantly progressed.
sentences.chinese: 在经济取得重大飞跃的同时，社会各项事业不断进步。

sentences.english: The three leaps in materialist view of interests give rise to the three improvements of development view.
sentences.chinese: 唯物主义利益观的三次飞跃促成了发展观的三次提升。

sentences.english: I would think, in a scholarly context, it would possibly produce leaps of understanding.
sentences.chinese: 我想，在学术环境下，也许会对它有飞跃性的理解。

sentences.english: The find of DNAzyme is a leap of knowledge to understand enzyme.
sentences.chinese: 其发现是人类对于酶的认识的又一次飞跃。

sentences.english: The approval of Anti-secession Law is a leap in the process of China's rule of law.
sentences.chinese: 《反分裂国家法》的出台是中国依法执政的新飞跃。

sentences.english: Teaching of analytical expression has changed from experience type to theories type.
sentences.chinese: 从经验型到理论型，作文教学研究经历了质的飞跃。

sentences.english: An asymmetrical jump in modern dance is a leap into the air with each leg in a different position.
sentences.chinese: 在跳现代舞不对称是每个腿到空气中不同位置的飞跃。

sentences.english: It leaps onto Unit 03 and strangles it, breaking it's neck.
sentences.chinese: 它飞跃在单位03上并且扼杀它，打破它是脖子。

sentences.english: Charles Lindbergh is the first man to fly the Atlantic alone.
sentences.chinese: 查理林德伯格是第一个独自飞跃大西洋的人。

sentences.english: Like religion, the nation-state myth requires a leap of faith.
sentences.chinese: 正如宗教一样，民族国家神话需要一个信仰的飞跃。

sentences.english: Tanggula is a Mongolian word meaning a high place that even eagles cannot fly over.
sentences.chinese: 唐古拉原自蒙语，意为雄鹰难以飞跃之地。

sentences.english: Children playing leap frog in a Harlem street, ca.
sentences.chinese: 孩子在玩的飞跃青蛙在哈勒姆街，长约。

sentences.english: Application framework bring the new era of software reused technology.
sentences.chinese: 构造应用框架是软件复用技术的飞跃。

sentences.english: By applying rationalism to experience, humans can make logical leaps.
sentences.chinese: 将理论应用于实践，人类就能顺理成章地进行飞跃。

sentences.english: "my involvement was a leap of faith, "Axelrod said.
sentences.chinese: “我的参与是一次信仰的飞跃，”阿克斯罗德说。

definition: to fly across/to fly over/to fly past/(literary) (of one's spirits) to soar
lit. to fly upwards swiftly/fig. rapid advance/rapidly developing (situation)
to leap forward/to make rapid progress/a leap forward
to leap to (a higher position etc)/to jump/(of a plane) to ascend
to advance by leaps and bounds
to step in/to stride forward/to forge ahead
